nodes.text: Lurr was a Promised One of the Outcasts following Ku-ki's leadership. She recorded at least one hologram about the fate of the Outcasts following their exodus to the Promised Land, which was discovered by a Republic-identified individual on Taris. Lurr felt that the "Promised Land" was an inaccurate name for the place in which she lived.
Lurr was created for the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, appearing in the Taris general mission "Chasing History".
